title: Understanding Catalyst Effects
text: To determine the effect of a catalyst on a reaction rate, consider what changes in the reaction mechanism or energy profile might occur.

title: Types of Analysis
text: Think about the different types of analysis: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Which one focuses on understanding the underlying principles of a reaction?

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Which type of analysis would help understand the effect of a catalyst on reaction rate?
